document.full_text: u-prince  - haitians traumatized by a big earthquake last year have watched japan's disaster with a mixture of sympathy and horror, and experts say the poor caribbean state could be hit anytime by a similar tsunami.
document.title: japan is tsunami risk reminder to quake-hit haiti
